name: OpenClaw
description: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant that runs locally and integrates with messaging platforms like WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, and Slack. Security hardened with loopback binding, token auth, and DM pairing.

notes.text: Gateway binds to loopback only (security hardened). Access requires SSH tunnel.
Run 'openclaw onboard' inside the container to configure AI providers and messaging channels.
Gateway starts automatically. Token saved to /root/.openclaw/.gateway-token
To access Control UI: ssh -L 18789:localhost:18789 root@<container-ip>, then open http://localhost:18789?token=YOUR_TOKEN
WhatsApp/Telegram work without UI access. DM pairing enabled - strangers must be approved.
